The community-care include nursing care , physiotherapy home modification accord condition patient . The intervention receive community-care program 12 week . Two session per week total 24 session . The control group receive traditional medication . The outcome measure include elderly mobility scale happiness scale . The measurement take initial completion program . SPSS use data analysis .
